system.damageOrEffect: 2d10+12 E, Pen 8, Blast (3), Volatile. Continues to do full damage within blast area for 1d5 rounds after detonation. If targeting a vehicle on 4+ DoS Blast centres on vehicle rather than a stationary point.

description.value:
Damage/Effect: 2d10+12 E, Pen 8, Blast (3), Volatile. Continues to do full damage within blast area for 1d5 rounds after detonation. If targeting a vehicle on 4+ DoS Blast centres on vehicle rather than a stationary point.

Qualities: Blast(3), Volatile
